name: Down to the Roots (AlteredDev, DeoraMoira, Monsthor, Haspik, KAO, rafi3104)
name_original: Down to the Roots (AlteredDev, DeoraMoira, Monsthor, Haspik, KAO, rafi3104)
description:
Down to the Roots

You play as Jean Racine, famous French playwright and poet from the XVIIth Century, who, after a quarrel with LaFontaine, another poet from his era, will curse him and his descendants. Your enemies will turn out to be some of the greatest authors from their eras, and you'll face them, one by one, to humiliate them in a rap battle, each more bold than the previous! Don't worry if you lose; you can always try your luck again, in this die and retry game! Use your adversary's own words against them and make your mark in History as the greatest rapper ever!
